import React from 'react'; const Footer = () => { return (

CyberSecurity Training Platform

Empowering government employees with cybersecurity awareness through realistic simulations and interactive training.

Quick Links

  • Home
  • Simulations
  • Quiz
  • Dashboard

Contact

For technical support or questions about the training platform, please contact your IT department.

Â© {new Date().getFullYear()} CyberSecurity Training Platform. All rights reserved.

); }; export default Footer;
